name: Bratz Fashion Pixiez: The Secret Necklace
summary: In the educational game, you will be transformed into a Bratz girl. There are several games to choose from. You can earn style points to get get new outfits and change your hairstyle. The game also includes tips on social and beauty topics ad well as information about travel fashion and astrology. Then there is a quiz section, a studio where you can design Bartz fashion and a music studio. The game teaches children vocabulary, spelling, design, fashion, logic and music.
